entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
